thread.title: My son is interested in the Indian Air Force: Sachin Tendulkar
thread.title_full: My son is interested in the Indian Air Force: Sachin Tendulkar

title: My son is interested in the Indian Air Force: Sachin Tendulkar
text:
My son is interested in the Indian Air Force: Sachin Tendulkar By IANS | Posted 27 minutes ago 
New Delhi: Cricket icon Sachin Tendulkar yesterday said his son was very interested in the Indian Air Force (IAF), but it was too early to say if he would like to join the esteemed organisation. 
IAF Hon Group Captain Sachin Tendulkar during the Air Force Day parade at the Hindon air base on the outskirts of New Delhi yesterday. Pic/AFP 
Tendulkar, an IAF Honorary Group Captain, was speaking on the sidelines of the Air Force Day Parade at the Hindon air base near here. 
“I wanted to get my son today. He’s very much interested in the air force,” said Tendulkar, whose son Arjun is 16 years old. Asked if his son wants to join the IAF, he said: “He’s too young to decide, but he is very interested in it.” 
Tendulkar was made an Honorary Group Captain in the IAF in 2010. Tags:
